bibl.title: Three Unpublished Zenon Papyri.
Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. III
bibl.author: Aly, Zaki

bibl.note: 1. P. Cair. Inv. 51597 + P. Coll. privées. Letter from Thrasymedes to Zenon about a consignment of kiki, June-July 252 B.C. - 2. Account of disbursement of some money for marketing purposes. - 3. Fragmentary loan-contract, 13 March 255 B.C.
Aly Zaki, Three Unpublished Zenon Papyri.
Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. III (Napoli, 1984) pp. 799-806, w. pll.
141.4 P. Cair. Inv. 51597 P. Coll. privées
